string.name: name
string.value: A Fourth Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 65, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 65 and tells you that she will give you the scroll she mentioned before when you reach Lv. 70. How will she react after seeing how much the Dragon she called cute before has grown? Go to town and meet with #b#p9010010##k when you are Lv. 70.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 80 by #bMay 4#k.
Watching someone develop really warms my heart! Congratulations on reaching Level 65, Evan! When you reach Level 70, I'll give you a really awesome scroll!
Huh? That was a mistake right? You're not really refusing my gift. Get the quest again, and this time make sure you press the ACCEPT button!
Hi, Evan! Whoa, that huge Dragon next to you... How did that cute Dragon get so big? I don't think I can call him cute anymore...
A Dragon Master that has such an awesome Dragon surely deserves better equipment. Now use this scroll to improve your #t1022097#.
#bI still have more scrolls#k! I will give you the next scroll if you reach #bLevel 80 by May 4th#k. Level 80 seems really far away. I believe in ya! You can do it!
Your Level is still a bit low. When you reach Level 70, you can receive a special gift that will only be given out during the event period. The event ends on May 4th, so be sure to hurry.
